content: sammy is an adorable little seal pup when made with the indicated yarn and hook size he is approximately 6 5 inches tall not including hat and 6 5 inches long this is an easy and project that is sure to delight anyone who loves plushies customize the color of the hat and scarf for extra fun and whimsy enjoy the pattern see more free patterns on my website and follow my facebook page for my amigurumi making updates https //www facebook com/littlemugglesworld ref=tn_tnmn
